name: Monolith Fangame: Skully's Monolith Dating Adventure
name_original: Monolith Fangame: Skully's Monolith Dating Adventure
description:
Fangame for Monolith: Relics of the Past, an excellent roguelike. Check it out here! https://store.steampowered.com/app/603960/Monolith/

In this text-based game, you are SKULLY, a robot skull man. You came to the Facility for ROMANCE. But might you find something else instead?

Test your knowledge of skully builds as you try to assemble a powerful weapon to impress Monolith's famous bosses.

This game does not feature sexual content, but may not be appropriate for all ages due to strong language.
